name: NIRA Dynamics AB
goal:
Enhancing road safety by innovative software functions for road vehicles like tire pressure monitoring, friction and road condition estimation, detection of loose wheels etc..
Replacing existing hardware sensors and systems by smart software using sensor fusion and advanced signal processing.
interests: Climate Action, Digital economy and society, Transport
euInitiatives:
- Regulations on tire pressure monitoring (R141)
- Regulations on vehicle type approval
- General road safety
- Connected mobility, C-ITS
